1805.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

1804.name: Avenge
1804.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
1804.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
1804.howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
1804.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

39215.name: Arcane Anomaly
39215.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, give this minion
+1 Health.
39215.flavor: He used to get work as a Spatial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.
39215.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
39215.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

1801.name: Duplicate
1801.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
1801.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
1801.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
1801.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

1800.name: Nerub'ar Weblord
1800.flavor: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.
1800.howToGet: Unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
1800.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

39190.name: Wicked Witchdoctor
39190.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random basic_Totem.
39190.flavor: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.
39190.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
39190.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

39197.name: Kara Kazham!
39197.text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
39197.flavor: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.
39197.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
39197.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

1809.name: Reincarnate
1809.text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
1809.flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.
1809.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
1809.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

1808.name: Unstable Ghoul
1808.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.
1808.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
1808.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

1366.name: Mass Dispel
1366.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
1366.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

1367.name: Shadow Word: Pain
1367.text: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
1367.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

1364.name: Temple Enforcer
1364.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

1365.name: Holy Fire
1365.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.

1363.name: Shadow Word: Death
1363.text: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 5 or more.
1363.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

2004.name: Powermace
2004.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

475.name: Murloc Tidecaller
475.text: Whenever a Murloc is summoned, gain +1 Attack.
475.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

38340.name: Forbidden Ancient
38340.text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each mana spent.
38340.flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

2008.name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
2008.text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
2008.flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

2009.name: Dark Wispers
2009.text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
2009.flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

1368.name: Shadowform
1368.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
1368.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

1369.name: River Crocolisk
1369.flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.
